name: Covered
description:
Covered is an atmospheric emotional story driven game. Walk around, Survive and Piece together the story of group of survivors. 

Heavily inspired by walking simulators and the last of us. The music is from the last of us but I'm not using nor do I intend to use this product commercially , it's just for feedback and showcase 

Controls:

WASD - Move       Mouse - Look       E - interact

Do you have any suggestion on what to add? Would it be something you'd play? Let me know in the comments. 

A Game By Pedro Beato
